Risma Diserang Politisi Nasdem, SCG : Aneh, Dekat Rakyat Kok Dikritik
01 Nov 2019, 06:07 by Ike Wulandari


Risma Diserang Politisi Nasdem, SCG : Aneh, Dekat Rakyat Kok Dikritik

KBRN, Surabaya : Pernyataan Sekretaris Fraksi Demokrat-Nasdem dan politisi Nasdem Imam Syafii yang menuding pejabat Pemerintah Kota Surabaya melakukan ”pencitraan” karena sering turun ke rakyat dinilai sebuah paradoks politik. ”Saya membacanya agak aneh. Di mana pun, dalam manuver dan ilmu politik apa pun, seorang politisi biasanya mengkritisi pejabat yang tidak dekat dengan rakyat. Tapi ini justru Pemkot Surabaya dekat dengan rakyat, turun ke kampung-kampung, kok malah diprotes. Ini sebuah paradoks politik,” ujar Direktur Lembaga Riset Politik SCG Consulting Group, Didik Prasetiyono, saat dihubungi, Jumat (1/11/2019)Menurut Didik, pernyataan politisi Nasdem itu dalam kaca mata ilmu politik malah kontraproduktif bagi partai besutan Surya Paloh tersebut. Sebab, persepsi publik Surabaya terhadap kinerja Pemkot Surabaya sangat bagus. Di semua survei lembaga riset independen, rata-rata kepuasan publik terhadap Walikota Tri Rismaharini dan Pemkot Surabaya mencapai lebih dari 80 persen.”Saya hanya khawatir pernyataan dari politisi Partai Nasdem tersebut malah merugikan partainya sendiri, karena masyarakat akan menilai, lho ini pejabat dekat dengan rakyat kok dikritisi, blusukan ke kampung kok diprotes,” ujar Didik.Menurut Didik, pernyataan politisi Nasdem yang menyeret metode kerja para pejabat Pemkot Surabaya dengan pemilihan walikota Surabaya terlalu mengada-ada. ”Ada atau tidak ada Pilkada, semua orang tahu kalau Bu Risma punya metode kerja turun ke rakyat, menghadirkan pemerintahan pro rakyat. Dan itu menular ke seluruh jajarannya hingga ke level lurah. Dan itu sudah dilakukan selama hampir 10 tahun. Masak begitu dinilai karena mau Pilwali,” papar Didik yang pernah melakukan studi elektoral politik di Amerika Serikat. Didik menyarankan kepada jajaran Pemkot Surabaya untuk tidak terlalu menanggapi manuver politisi Nasdem Imam Syafii tersebut. ”Semua pejabat publik harus dekat dengan rakyat. Jangan takut dianggap pencitraan. Fakta gaya Bu Risma yang sering turun ini dicintai rakyat, wajar saja menjadi rujukan bagi seluruh birokrat di Pemkot Surabaya untuk juga dekat dengan rakyat,” jelas Didik.Terkait kritik politisi Nasdem tentang Kepala Badan Perencanaan Pembangunan Kota Surabaya Eri Cahyadi yang sering turun ke lapangan, Didik menjelaskan bahwa metode kerja seperti memang dibudayakan oleh Tri Rismaharini.”Semua kepala OPD hingga lurah sering turun ke lapangan. Kalau dalam konteks Bappeko, itu ada fungsi pengendalian pembangunan. Mereka turun ke lapangan, melakukan uji petik, hasilnya digunakan sebagai evaluasi untuk perencanaan ke depan. Sehingga perencanaan pembangunan semakin baik, hasilnya pun optimal. Masak begitu dipermasalahkan?” pungkas Didik. Seperti diketahui, politisi Nasdem skaligus Sekretaris Fraksi Demokrat-Nasdem, Imam Syafi'i mengkritisi Kepala Bappeko Surabaya Eri Cahyadi yang dinilai turun ke lapangan karena bakal ikut Pilwali."Ini kan mau Pilwali, saya langsung saja, Kepala Bappeko itu sering offside. Hal-hal yang seharusnya dikerjakan Kepala Dinas langsung dikerjakan sendiri. Sampai masuk-masuk ke Kelurahan segala dan menjanjikan ke RW-RW akan mengakomodir programnya. Sampai menjanjikan kalau nggak bisa bakal mundur. Ini kan nggak bener," kata Imam.Imam mengingatkan agar Kepala Bappeko bekerja sesuai tugas dan fungsinya. "Hanya sampai perencanaan saja. Kalau sudah sampai program atau apa lainnya kan sudah offside," kata Imam.

Risma Is Attacked By Nasdem Politicians, SCG: Strange, Near People How come Criticized
Nov 01 2019, 06:07 by Ike Wulandari


Risma Is Attacked By Nasdem Politicians, SCG: Strange, Near People How come Criticized

KBRN, Surabaya: Statement of the Secretary of the Democrat-Nasdem Faction and Nasdem politician Imam Syafii who accused Surabaya City Government officials of doing "imaging" because it often descended on the people was considered a political paradox. "I read it a bit strange. Everywhere, in any maneuver and political science, a politician usually criticizes officials who are not close to the people. But this is precisely the Surabaya City Government close to the people, down to the villages, why instead protested. This is a political paradox, "said the Director of the SCG Consulting Group Political Research Institute, Didik Prasetiyono, when contacted on Friday (1/11/2019). According to Didik, Nasdem's statement by politicians in the political science perspective was actually counterproductive to the party made by Surya Paloh. This is because Surabaya's public perception of the performance of the Surabaya City Government is very good. In all surveys of independent research institutes, the average public satisfaction with Mayor Tri Rismaharini and Surabaya City Government reaches more than 80 percent. "I am only worried that the statement from the Nasdem Party politician will actually harm his own party, because the public will judge, you know, this official is close to why are people being criticized, protesting to the village is being protested, "said Didik. According to Didik, Nasdem's politician's statement that dragged the working methods of Surabaya City Government officials to the election of the mayor of Surabaya was far-fetched. "Whether or not there is a local election, everyone knows that Mrs. Risma has a method of working down to the people, presenting a pro-people government. And it spreads to all of its ranks up to the village level. And that has been done for almost 10 years. Cook is so valued because you want Pilwali, "said Didik who had conducted political electoral studies in the United States. Didik suggested to the Surabaya City Government officials not to respond too much to the politician's maneuvering Nasdem Imam Syafii. "All public officials must be close to the people. Don't be afraid of being considered imaging. The fact that Mrs. Risma's style often falls is loved by the people, it is only natural to become a reference for all bureaucrats in Surabaya City Government to also be close to the people, "explained Didik. Didik explained that the work method was indeed cultivated by Tri Rismaharini. "All OPD heads to the village head often went to the field. In the context of Bappeko, there is a function of development control. They go to the field, do a quotation test, the results are used as an evaluation for future planning. So that development planning is getting better, the results are optimal. How could that be questioned? "Concluded Didik. As is known, politician Nasdem as well as Secretary of the Democrat-Nasdem Faction, Imam Syafi'i criticized Surabaya Bappeko Head Eri Cahyadi who was judged to go to the field because he would join Pilwali. things that should have been done by the Head of Service were directly done by themselves. Until entering into the Kelurahan everything and promising to RW-RW would accommodate the program. Until promising if it could not be backed up. This was not right, "Imam said. Imam reminded the Head of Bappeko to work according to their duties and functions. "Only up to the planning. If the program or anything else is already offside," Imam said.
